content:
That's a great plan!

Using a combination of shoe cubbies and shoe boxes will provide a great way to store your shoes, keeping them organized, protected, and easy to find. Storing your Tory Burch shoes in a shoe box will keep them dust-free and protected, and the cubbies will provide a convenient spot to store your other shoes.

The over-the-door shoe organizer is a great idea for storing less frequently worn shoes, as it will maximize your closet space and keep them out of the way. Just make sure to choose an organizer that can hold the weight of your shoes and is easy to install.

By implementing this system, you'll be able to:

* Keep your shoes organized and easy to find
* Protect your shoes from dust and damage
* Maximize your closet space
* Enjoy your beautiful shoes for years to come

Remember to clean your shoes before storing them, and consider storing out-of-season shoes in bins or containers to free up space in your closet.

You're doing a great job of organizing your closet, and I'm excited to see the final result!

Do you have any other areas of your closet you'd like to organize, or are you ready to start implementing your new system?
